text: Ab wahi log jo kal uski manzilat ki tamanna kar rahey thay kehne lagey “afsos, hum bhool gaye thay ke Allah apne bandon mein se jiska rizq chahta hai kushada karta hai aur jisey chahta hai napa-tula deta hai.Agar Allah ne humpar ehsan na kiya hota to humein bhi zameen mein dhansa deta. Afsos humko yaad na raha ke kafir falaah nahin paya karte.”
